Updated November     pm





Jul   Indianapolis IN USA Michigan Wolverines running back Blake Corum speaks to the media during the Big  football media day at Lucas Oil Stadium PERIOD Mandatory Credit Robert GoddinUSA TODAY Sports

Secondranked Michigan is without suspended head coach Jim Harbaugh when it opens the  season against East Carolina on Saturday at Ann Arbor Mich PERIOD

The Wolverines  in  dont figure to miss Harbaugh who serves the first of a schoolimposed threegame punishment for his role in NCAA violations involving recruiting and coaching time PERIOD Defensive coordinator Jesse Minter will run the Wolverines against the Pirates who posted an  record last season PERIOD

 Harbaugh said Monday of the suspension PERIOD 

Offensive coordinator Sherrone Moore is also serving a suspension Saturday due to the NCAA issues PERIOD Quarterbacks coach Kirk Campbell will call the plays PERIOD

Campbell figures to often get the ball to returning firstteam AllAmerican running back Blake Corum against the Pirates PERIOD

Corum finished seventh in Heisman Trophy balloting last season when he rushed for  yards the eighth highest singleseason total in Wolverines history PERIOD He rushed for  touchdowns before effectively missing the final   games due to a serious knee injury PERIOD

Corum tore the meniscus sprained the MCL and sustained a bone bruise in the second quarter against Illinois on Nov PERIOD  PERIOD He attempted to play against Ohio State the following week but left after two carries and missed the rest of the season PERIOD

The injury prevented Corum from leaving for the NFL PERIOD He now sees the good side of the adversity PERIOD

 Corum said PERIOD This is something I can come back from and I got it repaired PERIOD Some people cant repair a lot of things.You just go out there and compete your butt offDo what you got to do for the team PERIOD Everybody wants this team to be good.The big thing with situations like that is that they cant pay any attention to the outside world and what their opinion isTheyve got to focus on themselves PERIOD
